snippet: As low-level violence sputtered in various Syrian cities on Saturday, the Security Council voted unanimously to send an advance team of up to 30 military observers to begin monitoring the tenuous cease-fire.  Read more »
abstract: As low-level violence sputtered in various Syrian cities on Saturday, the Security Council voted unanimously to send an advance team of up to 30 military observers to begin monitoring the tenuous cease-fire. Read more »

headline.main: U.N. Votes to Send Observers To Syria Amid a Shaky Truce
